PHRASE.LANG: Roux means red-haired, and he's a cheeky little fellow who'll keep your loved-one company when you aren't around. Roux is available exclusively in the Gift Machine! [#Legal]
Cet espiègle compagnon entièrement roux tiendra compagnie à votre bien-aimé(e) lorsque vous ne serez pas dans les parages. Roux est disponible en exclusivité dans la Machine à Cadeaux ! [#Legal]

"Roux" bedeutet "rothaarig", und er ist ein niedlicher kleiner Kerl, der deinem Schatz Gesellschaft leisten kann, wenn du einmal nicht da bist. Roux ist nur in der Geschenkmaschine erhältlich! [#Legal]
Roux significa pelo rosso e lui è proprio un piccolo sfacciatello che terrà compagnia ai tuoi cari quando tu non ci sarai. Roux è disponibile solo nella Macchina dispensa regali. [#Legal]
El zorro Rolfo se convertirá en el compañero ideal de tu pareja cuando tú estés lejos. ¡Puedes conseguir a Rolfo en la máquina de regalos! [#Legal]
Roux means red-haired, and he's a cheeky little fellow who'll keep your loved-one company when you aren't around. Roux is available exclusively in the Gift Machine! [#Legal]
Roux means red-haired, and he's a cheeky little fellow who'll keep your loved-one company when you aren't around. Roux is available exclusively in the Gift Machine! [#Legal]
